about_the_game:
In the game, players can choose either the French camp or the Soviet camp, and destroy the enemy's buildings to win.
Players can build different weapons and arms, each faction has different buildings, and a reasonable combination of arms can make it easier for you to win.
If the player chooses the French faction, they can build a unique French artillery weapon. This weapon has the characteristics of high damage and wide attack range, which can effectively resist the enemy's attack. And can build M4 tanks, which are characterized by low construction costs and fast movement.
If the player chooses the Soviet camp, they can build the T-34 tank. This tank is characterized by high damage and high health value, which is especially suitable for attacking.
